summary: Fabio Bonetti has been married to Livia for almost 20 years. One day a private eye investigating on their neighbors, the Vitali family, by mistake starts filming and recording Livia's life.... See full summary »
cast: Alberto Sordi|Monica Vitti|Isabella De Bernardi|Salvatore Jacono|Giuseppe Mannajuolo|Micaela Pignatelli|Pier Francesco Aiello|Napoleone Scrugli|Ivana Monti|Claudio Gora|Gianni Letta|Sandro Paternostro|Cesare Cadeo

title: Sé que sabes lo que sé
